name: Eve (DanTheBriggs)
description:
Eve was created by myself and 3 other students over a period of ~7 weeks.

Eve is a mystery visual novel where you take the role of a detective tasked with preventing a murder. Eve's story was written to be solved in multiple ways, with different endings based on who you choose to talk to, what evidence you uncover, and ultimately who you accuse.

Due to time constraints, only 2 characters are available to talk to: The Bartender, and The Main Dancer.

Please download the standalone player for a smoother experience.
